Perceptor/Starstorm:

"Oh my....."tought Starstorm whose was ready if things went wrong.

"You see, newcommers"said Perceptor "They, the tripedocus, insult you before 
you did anything... can you trust in someone that acts like that? Listen 
me... Hydras and the Predacons can offer you more than those Tripedocus... 
Join us  against them"
